ie.ucd.sensetile.sensorboard.simulator.formal.sensor
Interface ISensor

All Known Implementing Classes:
AxisAccelerometerSensor, LightSensor, PressureSensor, SoundSensor, ThermistorSensor, UltrasonicSensor
public interface ISensor

This interface represents an abstraction of sensor component.

boolean isEnabled()
Are you enabled ?

Returns:
enabled.

JML Method Specifications: @Pure
    ensures \result == mod_enabled;

setEnable

void setEnable(boolean theFlag)
Turn off / on this component.

Parameters:
theFlag - - on / off.

JML Method Specifications: 
    assignable mod_enabled; 
    ensures mod_enabled == theFlag;

getValue

int getValue()
What is the measured value for this component ?

Returns:
mod_value measured value.

JML Method Specifications: @Pure
    requires isEnabled(); 
    assignable \nothing; 
    ensures \result == mod_value;

measure

void measure()
             throws MissingSensorException
Measure current value.If sensor is not available throws an MissingSensorException.

Throws:
MissingSensorException

JML Method Specifications: 
  normal_behavior
    requires isEnabled(); 
    assignable mod_value, mod_mesure; 
    ensures mod_min <= mod_value && mod_value <= mod_max; 
  exceptional_behavior
    requires !isEnabled(); 
    signals (MissingSensorException e) true;
